alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 10 at 12:21PM EST until March 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LEON...SOUTHEASTERN GRADY AND SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES... At 1221 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Tallahassee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Alma, Fincher, Moncrief, Festus, Lake Iamonia, Lois, Rocky Hill, Killearn Lakes, Miccosukee, Jarrott, Bradfordville, Metcalf, Pisgah Church and Lake Miccosukee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
